#Base Data with World Bank imported, GDP, GDP growth, Hospital beds/1,000 ppl, Poverty= Poverty head count ratio at 1.90 a day(% of pop), CO2em: CO2 emissions (metric tons/capita), 
```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(COVID19, car, tidyverse, ggplot2, dplyr, leaps, readr)

x <- covid19()
covid19<- covid19(level = 1, start = "2020-03-15", end = "2021-03-15",)
wb <- c("gdp" = "NY.GDP.MKTP.CD", "hosp_beds" = "SH.MED.BEDS.ZS","gdp_grow" = "NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG","poverty" = "SI.POV.DDAY", "co2em" = "EN.ATM.CO2E.PC")
wbdcovid  <- covid19(wb = wb)

wbdcovid
```
